GlobalChangeSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_GLOBALCHANGE_EVENTREGISTRATIONCHARITABLESPLIT ( @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @ASOF as datetime = null, @NUMBERADDED int = 0 output, @NUMBEREDITED int = 0 output, @NUMBERDELETED int = 0 output, @REVENUEAPPSELECTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER ) as set nocount off;
declare @SOURCELINECOUNT integer declare @TYPEISGIFT integer DECLARE @myid uniqueidentifier DECLARE @receipt money
declare @I_MAX integer declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate(); set @NUMBERADDED = 0; set @NUMBEREDITED = 0; set @NUMBERDELETED = 0;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output;
begin try -- do the global change operation here, and set @NUMBERADDED, @NUMBEREDITED, and/or @NUMBERDELETED as appropriate DECLARE @REVENUEAPPSELECTION TABLE (id UNIQUEIDENTIFIER PRIMARY KEY);
INSERT INTO @REVENUEAPPSELECTION SELECT id FROM dbo.Ufn_idsetreader_getresults_guid(@REVENUEAPPSELECTIONID)
declare @T table ( PK int identity(1,1), REVENUEAPPID uniqueidentifier ) declare @I int = 1
insert into @T select ID from @REVENUEAPPSELECTION SelectionResults
select @I_MAX = count(*) from @T
declare @REVENUEAPPID uniqueidentifier
--BEGIN LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE while @I <= @I_MAX begin select @REVENUEAPPID = REVENUEAPPID from @T where PK = @I
select @SOURCELINECOUNT = count(*) from financialtransactionlineitem where sourcelineitemid=@REVENUEAPPID select @TYPEISGIFT = count(*) from revenuesplit_ext where id=@REVENUEAPPID and application = 'Event Registration' and type='Gift'
SET @myid = NEWID()
--SET @receipt = (select receiptamount -- from eventregistrantpayment where paymentid=@REVENUEAPPID)
--changed to get receipt amount from revenue_ext because eventregistrantpayment.receiptamount wasn't always populated (2012 and earlier?) SET @receipt = (select receiptamount from revenue_ext inner join financialtransactionlineitem ftli on revenue_ext.id = ftli.financialtransactionid where ftli.id=@REVENUEAPPID)
if (@SOURCELINECOUNT = 0) and (@TYPEISGIFT > 0) begin
insert into financialtransactionlineitem (id,financialtransactionid,transactionamount,visible,addedbyid,changedbyid,dateadded,datechanged, description,sequence,typecode,postdate,poststatuscode, reversedlineitemid,sourcelineitemid,targetlineitemid,deletedon, baseamount,orgamount,quantity,unitvalue,financialtransactionlineitemadjustmentid,batchid) select @myid, financialtransactionid,(transactionamount - @receipt),visible,addedbyid,changedbyid,getdate(),getdate(), description,sequence,typecode,postdate,poststatuscode, reversedlineitemid,@revenueappid,targetlineitemid,deletedon, (baseamount - @receipt),(orgamount - @receipt),quantity,unitvalue,financialtransactionlineitemadjustmentid,batchid from financialtransactionlineitem where id=@revenueappid
update financialtransactionlineitem set transactionamount = @receipt, baseamount = @receipt, orgamount = @receipt where id=@revenueappid
insert into revenuesplit_ext (id,designationid,typecode,applicationcode,overridebusinessunits,revenuesplitbusinessunitoverridecodeid, addedbyid,changedbyid,dateadded,datechanged) select @myid,null,1,applicationcode,overridebusinessunits,revenuesplitbusinessunitoverridecodeid, addedbyid,changedbyid,getdate(),getdate() from revenuesplit_ext where id=@revenueappid
insert into eventregistrantpayment (id,paymentid,registrantid,addedbyid,changedbyid,dateadded,datechanged,amount,applicationcurrencyid, applicationexchangerateid,receiptamount) select newid(),@myid,registrantid,addedbyid,changedbyid,getdate(),getdate(),(amount - @receipt),applicationcurrencyid, applicationexchangerateid,0 from eventregistrantpayment where paymentid=@revenueappid
update eventregistrantpayment set receiptamount=@receipt,amount=@receipt where paymentid=@revenueappid
set @NUMBEREDITED = @NUMBEREDITED + @@ROWCOUNT;
end
set @I = @I + 1 end --END LOOPING THROUGH TABLE DEFINED ABOVE end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
